name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni Tsubasa
summary: Umineko no Naku Koro ni Tsubasa (うみねこのなく頃に翼, lit. When the Seagulls Cry Wings) is a collection of visual novel adaptations of short stories previously released as booklets. It is officially subtitled When They Cry 4+ and released on the same day with Twilight of the Golden Witch and Golden Fantasia as a bonus disc.
